person.persName: Balus C. Rice (Hopkins County, KY, farmer, pvt 50th Missouri Inf. (usa))

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of John C. Rice and Jane Rice. Married to Melissa F. Rice. Father of John R. Rice and Lewis S. Rice. Student in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1860. Served in the 50th Regiment Missouri Infantry (U.S.A.) as a private.
